name: RunBotRun
description:
This is a weekend project inspired by one of my favorite Starcraft II custom games, RunlingRun!

Run your bot to the center of the maze to win! Sounds simple enough, right?

Make sure to avoid the enemy sentinels, and tag your teammates to revive them. Teamwork is key here!

Use W,A,S,D to move around, spacebar to use your skill. each robot has a unique skill!
